name: pixiv2html
description: Converts markuped text of pixiv novel into HTML.

scripts.coverage: mochify test/*.ls --reporter spec --extension .ls --transform browserify-livescript --plugin [ mochify-istanbul --report text --report text-summary --report lcov --dir ./coverage --exclude "**/+(test|node_modules)/**/*" ]
scripts.coveralls: npm run coverage && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.test: npm run node && npm run phantom
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run readme && npm run semantic-release
